getRealm().Description: Returns authentication realm. The realm may not be null.

getParameters().Description: Returns authentication parameters map. Keys in the map are lower-cased.

Returns: the parameter with the given name
Parameters: The name of the parameter to be returned
getParameter(java.lang.String).Description: Returns authentication parameter with the given name, if available.

RFC2617Scheme().Description: Default constructor for RFC2617 compliant authetication schemes.

ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit Abstract authentication scheme class that lays foundation for all RFC 2617 compliant authetication schemes and provides capabilities common to all authentication schemes defined in RFC 2617.
